    Enum Description
    ConjugateGradientSolver.PreconditioningMethod  
    ConjugateGradientSolver.ProblemConversionMethod
    Enumeration of supported methods for converting a non symmetric or non positive definite problem into a symmetric positive definite problem, for solving it using the conjugate gradient solver.

    An enumeration of all currently supported coordinate descent methods.
